original_text: ‘Look at this! I will cause you to destroy your enemies, like a heavy weight that threshes grain. 41: ‘thresh’ means to hit hard, to remove seeds from wheat or other crops. You will have new sharp metal points that are like teeth. You will thresh the mountains and you will break them into pieces. You will make the hills become like straw. ‘Look at this! I will cause you to destroy your enemies,
korean_text: 보라 내가 너를 이가 날카로운 새 타작기로 삼으리니 네가 산들을 쳐서 부스러기를 만들 것이며 작은 산들을 겨 같이 만들 것이라

sentences.original_text: I will cause you to destroy your enemies
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너로 하여금 네 원수들을 파괴하게 하리라

sentences.original_text: like a heavy weight that threshes grain
to remove seeds from wheat or other crops
You will have new sharp metal points
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 새로운 날카로운 쇠 부리를 가지게 되리라

sentences.original_text: and you will break them into pieces
You will make the hills become like straw
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 언덕들을 지푸라기 같게 만들 것이라

sentences.original_text: I will cause you to destroy your enemies
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너로 하여금 네 원수들을 파괴하게 하리라
